answers.answer: Hello,Such feeling of warmth can be due to vascular disease,diabetes,vit B 12 deficiency or irritation of the nerves.It can also be due to underlying varicocele.It is important to consult a urologist and get these possibilities ruled out.I hope it helps.Take care and pls do keep me posted on how you are doing or if you have any additional doubts.Kind regards.

question: I've noticed in the last week that my left testicle will all of a sudden feel warm, like it is wet on the outside. It's not when I am urinating but could be any part of the day. It's of course not warm or wet. What could be the problem?
title: Testicle question
